required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Secondary Rupture of Aortic Aneurysm Post EVAR
clinical_study.official_title: Secondary Rupture of Aortic Aneurysm After EVAR Management

brief_summary.textblock: Post-stent rupture of the abdominal aorta is a rare occurrence and with few publications: only 2 multicenter studies and one meta-analysis in 2017 listed this complication As well as a few cases reports This study, the first carried out in France, aims to describe the survival in patients with secondary rupture of the aneurysm despite initial treatment with EVAR.

primary_outcome.measure: describe survival in patient with secondary rupture aneurysm despite endovascular treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Compare survival in patients with rupture secondary aneurysm despite treatment
secondary_outcome.description: with endovascular according to: management of secondary rupture of the aneurysm the hemodynamic state on arrival in the center treating the size of the aneurysm sac

secondary_outcome.measure: 2) Explore the risk factors for mortality in study patients

study_pop.textblock: patients with ruptured aortic aneurysm + EVAR

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- - Patient who had a ruptured aortic aneurysm between 01/01/1993 and 07/31/2020)
- Patients whose aortic aneurysm has been treated with EVAR
Exclusion Criteria:
- No
